name: Swarmer Cloud
description:
WARNING, IT FLASHES

You are yellow, left click to select units, right click to move them.

Your large unit will collect resources when moved into an area with them. Once it has collected enough it will produce a unit.

Spent 1.5 days on this since original idea got scrapped early on. Had lectures on final day which got in the way a bit. Not a super complex game, selection can break sometimes. Might make a nice base for another future side project.
